list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an outline of something, especially a person's face, as seen from one side.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the man turned and she caught his profile
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người đàn ông quay lại và cô bắt được hồ sơ của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a short article giving a description of a person or organization.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a profile of a Texas tycoon
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một hồ sơ của một TEXAS TYCOON

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the extent to which a person or organization attracts public notice.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: raising the profile of women in industry
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nâng cao hồ sơ của phụ nữ trong ngành

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a graphical or other representation of information relating to particular characteristics of something, recorded in quantified form.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the blood profiles of cancer patients
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: hồ sơ máu của bệnh nhân ung thư

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: describe (a person or organization, especially a public figure) in a short article.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was to profile each candidate
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy là hồ sơ mỗi ứng cử viên

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: represent in outline from one side.
